amendment.description: To extend temporarily the extended period of protection for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 750 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 750 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5788) To extend temporarily the extended period of protection for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 750 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 750 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 1003.
